ModMetaData.name: Crystalloid
ModMetaData.author: AtomicRavioli
ModMetaData.description:
V2.4 Adds a race of xenohumans called Crystalloids.
<size=24>Set mod order to load this after AlienRaces (required) and Vanilla Psycasts Expanded</size>
Thanks to erdelf for their work on the AlienRaces framework, and Chjess for their help on some of the more complex features!
